content.description: An independent polling agency was hired to track the preferences of registered voters in a district for an upcoming election. The polling agency divided the district into twenty regions and believes that the regions are similar to one another in their composition. The agency then randomly selected two of the regions and surveyed all registered voters in both regions.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the sampling method used by the polling agency?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Describe an appropriate method for gathering and representing data.
